aeb68b7da9776ef599b02e3d0fcb449aabcaf809.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this in test code. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations in test code.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.

dd6b080a16e0933b3d19305f84ba01c8893839f3.commitMessage: all TODO/FIXME were removed , some of them converted to issues

91d979ef8eab8d8f6fe5e5b64ec0586b49ea0315.commitMessage:
Reduce complexity in indentation/HandlerFactory class by grouping catch blocks

Pull #833

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

e50e1fcd1c17ba1f73d11df38382907cc163a1d1.commitMessage:
Use the new syntactic sugar "for loop".

End of the cosmetic changes.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

2c02a737d97980eb4c984056c33265b8a917a717.commitMessage:
Updated to V 1.7 of commons-beanutils (Apache license 2.0).

This allows us to change the type converters locally in AutomaticBean,
not globally per classloader. This change is beneficial mainly
in some embedded scenarios like IDE plugins.

8ec36bc770a78f423f6c0d0c37b9efd7981815ed.commitMessage:
improved error handling for illegal property values, e.g.
1. <property name="classLoader" value=""/>. Is it by accident or by
design that bean properties like this cannot be set because they aren't "simple" types?
2. <property name="tabWidth" value="eight"/>

e8d025321c3d1f5741e860bd96a93e7d2169ca9c.commitMessage: don't silently ignore misspelled property names

b3caa3b7ad0a135038c2c1c5bda4fccb897a00c4.commitMessage: Fix bug where init/destroy not called for Checks.

08d6efe49d2960d9bd61bfb9cca65910f0c19b58.commitMessage:
make AutomaticBean.configure() final and provide defined extension points
to prevent programming errors in user classes.
